Title: ‚Ü©Ô∏è What is known about the situation with the stranded ship off t...

What is known about the situation with the stranded ship off the coast of Sakhalin: ‚ñ™Ô∏èIn the Nevelsky district of Sakhalin, a foreign cargo ship ran aground on the night of February 8th. Preliminarily, there is no threat to the life of the crew;‚ñ™Ô∏èDivers and watercraft cannot approach the ship due to a strong storm;‚ñ™Ô∏èA pre-investigation check has been organized due to the ship running aground, the Eastern Interregional Investigation Department for Transport of the Investigative Committee of Russia reported;‚ñ™Ô∏èDistrict Rospotrebnadzor will take daily water samples to determine whether there are traces in it petroleum products;‚ñ™Ô∏èAn operational headquarters was created under the leadership of Deputy Prime Minister Alexei Rimsha;‚ñ™Ô∏èA municipal emergency regime was introduced in the Nevelsky district;‚ñ™Ô∏èLimarenko fears that the owner of a foreign cargo ship will abandon him on the coast.
